Hardware Configuration
[System Configuration]

Collaboration diagram for Hardware Configuration:

Detailed Description

These macros can be used to determine current the hardware configuration.


Defines

#define _DWFCORE_X86_SYSTEM
 Intel 80x86 hardware platform.
#define _DWFCORE_ALPHA_SYSTEM
 DEC Alpha hardware platform.
#define _DWFCORE_PPC_SYSTEM
 Motorola PowerPC hardware platform.
#define _DWFCORE_MIPS_SYSTEM
 MIPS hardware platform.
#define _DWFCORE_68K_SYSTEM
 Motorola 680x0 hardware platform.
#define _DWFCORE_BIG_ENDIAN_SYSTEM
 Big endian hardware platform.
#define _DWFCORE_LITTLE_ENDIAN_SYSTEM
 Little endian hardware platform.
